meanings.sent1: The rabbit will yump over the log.
meanings.sent2: I saw the cat yump onto the fence.
meanings.sent3: The kangaroo decided to yump over the moon for fun.
meanings.sent4: The athlete's heart seemed to yump with excitement before the race.
meanings.sent5: The child's laughter made her heart yump with joy.

meanings.sent1: The frog's yump surprised us all.
meanings.sent3: The yump of the squirrel made us all chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The yump of the ball startled the players.
meanings.sent5: The yump of the dolphin was graceful and elegant.
